name: buddyboss-markdown
description: Adds Markdown support for BuddyBoss Platform content (activities, comments, etc.).

scripts.package: npm run plugin-zip && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); fs.renameSync('buddyboss-markdown.zip', 'buddyboss-markdown-' + pkg.version + '.zip'); console.log('Created: buddyboss-markdown-' + pkg.version + '.zip');"

author: Allen Day
